div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 16:35 pm CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 77. Breezy, with a south wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 1am. Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly clear, with a low around 47. South wind 5 to 15 mph becoming west southwest after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
Sunny, with a high near 84. West northwest wind 5 to 10 mph becoming north northeast in the afternoon.

span.span: It is with many regrets and sadness that the 2020 Loomis Alumni Banquet is canceled for June 20th of 2020. Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, committee members of the Class of 1970, who would be hosts, made a decision to not put anyone at a health risk or continue with plans for the banquet. Several texts, calls, and communications were involved in the cancellation process.

The auction that provides funds for the Loomis Alumni scholarship fund will not take place. All donations, in lieu of items, would be appreciated and will be given to this fund. A suggestion to add to this fund would be to donate the cost of the number of tickets at $20.00 each that you would purchase to attend the banquet or a personal monetary donation to the Loomis Alumni. Please consider doing this so these awards could be given to three 2020 Loomis High School seniors and a graduate of Loomis attending college. Scholarship applications can be obtained and returned to Whitney Billeter, guidance counselor at Loomis Public School. Mailing address is P.O. Box 250, Loomis, Ne. 68958

Donations for the Alumni fund can be made out to Loomis Alumni and mailed to: Loomis Alumni Fund, First State Bank, P.O. Box 230 Loomis, Ne. 68958. To donate to the scholarship fund please send to the same address and designate on check or letter.
The Class of 1970 was looking forward to seeing everyone, but circumstances beyond our control and for the health safety of all attending was the deciding factor. We look forward to 2021.
Sue Broeker, Larry Evans, Merle Johnson, Jim Lauer, Dan Thorell, Sue Waller

a.aria-label: Read more about Loomis High School Alumni

div.p: Due to recent recommendations, The Loomis school building will have new hours starting Monday, April 6th. The new hours are Monday-Thursday 8:00-12:30. Fridays the school will be open 8:00-10:00. The weight room and playground area will be closed until further notice. We will communicate any other changes as they are decided upon.

a.aria-label: Read more about Loomis Public School Building Hours
Read more about LPS Announcement 3-25-20

div.p: Please use the link below to sign up for school lunches for the week of 4/20/20. Meals are for all Loomis PK-12 students and their siblings under the age of 19. The deadline to sign up for lunches is Sunday at 6:00 PM each week. The lunch menu will always include a main dish, fruit/vegetable, dessert, and milk.

div.p:
Spanish Teacher 9-12 (Part-Time or Full-Time)
Loomis Public School is seeking a Part-Time or Full-Time 9-12 Spanish Teacher for the 2020-21 school year.
Extra Curricular duties are available include Girls Basketball, Football, Speech, One Act.
